\section*{\begin{picture}(20,0) \put(-5,-10){\includegraphics*[width=1cm]{/www/erowid.org/experiences/images/erologo_1cm_600dpi_greyscale}} \end{picture} Erowid Experience Vaults Report Id: 66579}

\subsection*{I Love It}
\vspace{-0.2cm}
by \emph{N Given}
\vspace{0.5cm}
\thispagestyle{plain}

\setlength{\parskip}{1ex}
\begin{tabular}[h]{|c|c|c|c|c|}
\hline
Dose:  T+ 0:00 & 10 capsls & oral & Wormwood & extract\\
\hline
\end{tabular}

\vspace{1mm}

\begin{tabular}[h]{|c|c|}
\hline
Body weight: & 128.00 lbs\\
\hline
\end{tabular}

\vspace{2mm}
I really love doing Wormwood. It doesn't get you high, but its an experience of its own. Almost as soon as I ingest it I'm overcome with a warm fuzzy feeling along with liny vision. I feel a meditative sensation with a creative touch accompanied by a heightened appreciation of music. It doesn't last long but it's really a great feeling. I love doing it. I just buy Wormwood extract from my local health food store and place it into gelcaps (its far too vile to ingest otherwise).

\end{document}
